data.title: Great Place
data.text: Great place for the family to see a real, live stage play.  Been there for decades so quality is always high.  Local actors who can act.

data.title: Great evening out.
data.text: Several times a year, my husband and I go to the ACO to watch plays.  We are on the mailing list, so we watch it carefully.  We have always been very impressed with the play selections and also the acting.  The theater is very comfortable. The attire of the clientele is varied. I have seen people very dressed up, but also in blue jeans and t-shirts.  Everyone always seems enjoy the plays very much.

data.title: Performance art is great!
data.text: They offer a variety of entertainment that's well worth coming to see. They also display art and their most recent exhibit that I saw there was fantastic. Local actors can perform and the audience will enjoy the plays every single time! They have an annual fund raiser and silent auction too for those eager to support this area art center.

data.title: community theater at it's best
data.text: This beautiful theater in downtown Springdale hosts multiple concerts, musicals and plays highlighting local talent. The theater has a great sound system, with not a bad seat in the house. The lobby doubles as an exhibition area for local artists and school award winnings talent.

data.title: What a great facility!
data.text: Wonderful theater in downtown Springdale.  Great facility that will be even better once all the updates are complete.  You could have a date night, or a night out with the whole family.  Lots of shows to choose from, and there are classes and other things as well.

data.title: Find your Arts Community Here!
data.text: Young or old, beginner or pro, singles or families, this is a place for you to enjoys the Arts, right in your own community. Northwest Arkansas residents and visitors can come to see the programs here or come and take a class. You can view visual art in the two Galleries, try out for a play or musical, sing with the Chorale, or play your instrument here at the Arts Center. You can enjoy the Northwest Arkansans trail system and make a stop at the Arts Center. Come on by and see what's happening, because every week offers new and exciting things! You can see everything from a solo cabaret style performance to our hit musical this summer "The Sound of Music."

data.title: The Arts Center of the Ozarks is a gem for the arts in Springdale!
data.text: Springdale has a wonderful place for our community to experience all aspects of the musical/dramatic/artistic world. This past Sunday they hosted Tales of the South, with writers reading their stories for the national radio show. Art Galleries display works from children to professional artists. "The Sound of Music" is their upcoming Summer Musical-come in and find out what's in store for you who enjoy singing or acting or come take a class and meet new friends!
